query: SELECT p.orderNumber, h.customerName, p.customerRef, (SELECT SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) FROM purchaseLines pl WHERE pl.purchaseId = p.id) as totalCurtains FROM purchases p JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000892'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xdfM6hBeGk8i8i.5dbeac8a2102 --database DxAqoJ22pGdNTCdjRs8uzu --execute SELECT p.orderNumber, h.customerName, p.customerRef, (SELECT SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) FROM purchaseLines pl WHERE pl.purchaseId = p.id) as totalCurtains FROM purchases p JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000892'
